channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NC

item.title: Report X-2024050636
item.description:
Report X-2024050636

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-17T21:11:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-02
  • City: GREENSBORO
  • State: NC

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: CALL WAS MADE TO THE DMP CAGE ABOUT A POSSIBLE LEAKING HAZMAT. DESIGNATED RESPONDER FOUND PACKAGE ON THE FLOOR. RESPONDER OPENED PACKAGE TO FIND 1 LOOSE CAP. FOLLOWING ALL PROPER RESPONDER METHODS, PACKAGE WAS SECURED AND RETURNED TO THE DMP CAGE TO BE PROCESSED
